page.title: 04TIMBER MERCHANTS-CHESTERTON
page.content: The Timber Merchants firm has existed for twelve years and has been on the present site of two acers for five years.The workshop covers nine thousand square feet.Ninety % of the timber comes from Sweden the rest from Finland, Russia and Canada.Bills of Lading for one thousand cubic metres of timber come every three months.The timber is softwood and coniferous.The best wood is kept inside the workshop and the poorer quality is kept outside.There are four machines,a plane,a cross-saw,bandsaw and a forklift truck.The timber is sold for roofs,furniture,house timber and packing cases.There are two directors and eight employers who work from 8.30 a.m. to 4.30 p.m and live fairly locally.
